title: FT (then FS): Factory 42 (PSA 5&5.5), McGraw Sov460, Y/B Scrap, low grade Matty, WaJo

posts.post_title: FT (then FS): Factory 42 (PSA 5&5.5), McGraw Sov460, Y/B Scrap, low grade Matty, WaJo
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

There's something for everyone here!  Greatest preference to trading: looking for T cards in T211 and higher (T211, T213, T215, T216, T217) and also 1913 Voskamp's Pirates...or anything else that might be interesting!

If I don't get make any trades by Wednesday morning, then, at that point, they are available for prices in parenthesis.  (PM/Email now to indicate interest.)

Email if you'd like larger scans.

Heinie Wagner - Bat On Right Shoulder - P42 - PSA 5 ($1300)
Ed Willetts - Willett - P42 - PSA 5.5 ($1400)

[STRIKE]Christy Mathewson - Portrait - P150 - PSA 1.5[/STRIKE] TRADED
Christy Mathewson - Dark Cap -P350 - PSA 2 ($350)
Walter Johnson - Portrait - SC 150-649OP - PSA 1.5 ($375)

Harry Davis - SC460-30 - Yellow-Brown Scrap - SGC A ($1250)

John McGraw - Glove At Hip - Sov460 - SGC 50 ($425)

Cheers,
Steve
